infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to show nearby zones and help you discover people in your area.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to location to show nearby zones and help you discover people in your area.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to select profile photos.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take profile photos.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Here Now to use your location to show nearby zones and help you discover people in your area.
